name: socelect
browserslist: > 0.2% or last 1 version and not dead
author: Douglas Lovell <doug@wbreeze.com>

scripts.build: yarn run clean && NODE_ENV='production' parcel build src/index.js --out-dir app/assets/javascripts/parceled --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.watch: yarn run clean && parcel watch src/index.js --out-dir app/assets/javascripts/parceled
